name: failsys.sh
description:
My LD46 entry.

Take the role of an emergency computer system in this short game.

You’ll need a keyboard and some way to listen to the audio! Everything else should be explained by the game.

Press Z to ignite the mineral flame, and keep it alive!

Press X to prevent the anti-matter stream from overloading your system, but keep it big enough to collect anti-matter from it.

Made with Unity, Nima, op-z, Audacity, and freetts.com.
